feed.title: GitHub GLSL Monthly Trending
feed.subtitle: Monthly Trending of GLSL in GitHub

entry.title: SaschaWillems/Vulkan
entry.summary: Examples and demos for the new Vulkan API

entry.title: PaddlePaddle/PaddleSpatial
entry.summary: PaddleSpatial is an open-source spatial-temporal computing tool based on PaddlePaddle.

entry.title: poiyomi/PoiyomiToonShader
entry.summary: A feature rich toon shader for unity and VR Chat

entry.title: tovacinni/sdf-explorer
entry.summary: This is accompanying code for our JCGT / I3D paper, "A Dataset and Explorer for 3D Signed Distance Functions (SDF)".

entry.title: pa1nki113r/Project_Brutality
entry.summary: This is the primary repository for collaborative efforts between Doom developers on Project Brutality. This is the bleeding-edge version that is constantly being developed on, and not meant in any way shape or form to be representative of the final version of the mod.

entry.title: higan-emu/higan
entry.summary: higan is a multi-system emulator focused on accuracy, preservation, and configurability.

entry.title: patriciogonzalezvivo/thebookofshaders
entry.summary: Step-by-step guide through the abstract and complex universe of Fragment Shaders.

entry.title: libretro/glsl-shaders
entry.summary: This repo is for glsl shaders converted by hand from libretro's common-shaders repo, since some don't play nicely with the cg2glsl script.

entry.title: KhronosGroup/SPIRV-Cross
entry.summary: SPIRV-Cross is a practical tool and library for performing reflection on SPIR-V and disassembling SPIR-V back to high level languages.

entry.title: DerKoun/bsnes-hd
entry.summary: bsnes fork that adds HD video features

entry.title: GDQuest/godot-shaders
entry.summary: A large library of free and open-source shaders for the Godot game engine. Here, you'll get 2D and 3D shaders with playable demos.
